artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Kyokutei Bakin; Publisher: Tōkyō Haishi Shuppansha
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: burnt-orange cover; pages with small printed text with a few images; image of man seated in garden; another image of a small group of people gathered on a verandah overlooking a garden; image of women mourning with a child on verandah, and ghost outside verandah also mourning
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
portfolio: From The Crescent Moon (Chinsetsu yumiharizuki 椿説弓張月)
title: The Crescent Moon, vol. 4
